title: Account on fake email
body: When i first made my account, quite some time i didn't really care about my email. But now as I realize that i cannot change my password and regret it because i gave out my password details out. Does anybody know what I can do to change my password?

replies.body:
>i gave out my password details out.


Them boost buys.
The email you first made an account on, does not need to be the same email your account is registered to.
Change your email first (to a real email), then change the password :)
